analysis.narrative:
ðŸ“Š **Consensus:** Mixed directional conviction with bullish sentiment metrics (70%+ across sources) contradicted by bearish structural warnings. Medium-low conviction due to year-end positioning conflicts and incomplete downside analysis.

ðŸ“ˆ **Themes:** (1) Valuation extremes vs institutional accumulation - record 218% market cap-to-GDP ratio clashing with consumer confidence highs and stablecoin/housing structural demand; (2) Elite capital flight signaling - Berkshire 57% cash ($381.7B) and Apple holdings reduction contrast with retail/401k flows (7.7% deferral rates); (3) Tech leadership divergence - AI/crypto momentum facing Nasdaq triple-top technical risks and breadth deterioration.

ðŸŽ¯ **Levels:** SPY ($687.01): Call Wall $700 (144k OI, active resistance 1.9% away), Put Wall $630 (143k OI, dormant support 8.3% away). Max Pain $688. Near active support: $680 (60k OI). QQQ ($619.43): Call Wall $620 (39k OI, immediate resistance 0.1% away), Put Wall $574.78 (122k OI, dormant 7.2% away). Max Pain $620. Near resistance: $630 (32k OI, active). /ES: 6847 support per Twitter analysis.
key_themes: valuation extremes and market cap-to-GDP warnings
institutional de-risking vs retail accumulation divergence
risk_factors: Record 218% market cap-to-GDP ratio signaling mean-reversion vulnerability
Berkshire 57% cash position and elite investor defensive positioning
Nasdaq triple-top pattern with breadth deterioration
Fed hawkish pivot risk on 2026 rate cut expectations
Regulatory tightening pressures on financials and crypto sectors
Year-end options expiry volatility and positioning unwind
analysis.intraday_levels: SPY testing $687-688 max pain zone with immediate call wall resistance at $700. QQQ pinned near $620 max pain with call wall capping upside. Watch for year-end positioning unwind creating chop within established ranges
analysis.swing_levels: SPY: Active call wall resistance $700 (144k OI) caps rallies, critical support at $680 (60k OI) then $630 put wall. QQQ: Resistance cluster $620-630, breakdown below $590 (78k OI support) targets $574.78 put wall. Expect tactical pullback into Q1 2026 per liquidity/positioning themes
